control.controller
Class GeneralUserController

java.lang.Object
  control.controller.GeneralUserController
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegisteredUserController
public class GeneralUserController
extends java.lang.Object

The GeneralUserController class is a control class that provides operations for general users, which are login/logout, operation of reading profiles of any staffs, and reading details of any publications.

See Also:
Repository, AcademicStaff, Publication

          A reference of repository, initialised when controller is created

Method Detail

loginout

public UserRole loginout(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String password)
Login if the current user is a general user. Otherwise, logout.

Parameters:
userName - UserName of the user that either to login or logout
password - To login, pass the correct password. To logout, pass null.
Returns:
Role of user after login or logout. Return UserRole.GENERAL_USER if passed wrong userName or password when login.
See Also:
UserRole, PMSystem.switchCurrentFrame(UserRole, int)

getPublicationID

getPublicationID

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPublicationID(java.lang.String authorName,
                                                        int year,
                                                        int groupNumber)
Return a Set of String representing ID for searching result of publications, with the searching conditions of authorName, year and groupNumber. Parameters could be passed by null or -1 representing "Any".

When parameters are (null, -1, -1), all publications ID will be returned.

Parameters:
authorName - UserName of whom the authors of publications must be
year - Year that publications must be published/uploaded, should be counted from 1900
groupNumber - Number of group that the author of publications must belongs to
Returns:
A Set of String representing ID for searching result of publications. Return null if passed searching conditions are invalid.

requestPublicationCopy

public java.lang.String requestPublicationCopy(java.lang.String publicationID)
Request a copy of publication. Which will send a email to notify the uploader of the publication.

Parameters:
publicationID - ID of the publication to request copy of
Returns:
Uploader's email. This return value is only used for testing so far.
